channel.title: Shop Buy/Sell Number Question
channel.description:
Alright, so I have a pretty noob question. I just recently added an elf mini-game, but I am having a problem with the shop.
As the shop uses fingernails instead of GP, you can only buy/sell stuff in that shop for fingernails.
Unfortunately, the shop buys ANYTHING, so you could sell a whip for 4M fingernails which would allow you to buy everything in the shop.
Here is my shops.cfg line:
[code]shop = 72 Fingernail_Shop! 2 2 1038 20000 1040 20000 1042 20000 1044 20000 1046 20000 1048 20000 76 100[/code]
Sorry that is all crammed together, the code tags did that. Here it is without code tags:
shop = 72 Fingernail_Shop! 2 2 1038 20000 1040 20000 1042 20000 1044 20000 1046 20000 1048 20000 76 100
The ID 2 and 2 are the buy sell integers.
I want to have: [ul][li]Only allowed to sell back what is in the shop.[/li] [li]Not allowed to sell other items to the shop.[/li] [li]Can buy from the shop, working right now just incase you have to change it[/li][/ul]
Thanks in your return. If you need any further information, please feel free to ask. Thanks.

item.title: Shop Buy/Sell Number Question
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Alright, so I have a pretty noob question. I just recently added an elf mini-game, but I am having a problem with the shop.

As the shop uses fingernails instead of GP, you can only buy/sell stuff in that shop for fingernails.

Unfortunately, the shop buys ANYTHING, so you could sell a whip for 4M fingernails which would allow you to buy everything in the shop.

Here is my shops.cfg line:

shop = 72	Fingernail_Shop!	2	2	1038	20000	1040	20000	1042	20000	1044	20000	1046	20000	1048	20000	76	100

Sorry that is all crammed together, the code tags did that. Here it is without code tags:

shop = 72 Fingernail_Shop! 2 2 1038 20000 1040 20000 1042 20000 1044 20000 1046 20000 1048 20000 76 100

The ID 2 and 2 are the buy sell integers.

I want to have:
[ul][li]Only allowed to sell back what is in the shop.[/li]
[li]Not allowed to sell other items to the shop.[/li]
[li]Can buy from the shop, working right now just incase you have to change it[/li][/ul]

Thanks in your return. If you need any further information, please feel free to ask. Thanks.

Read full topic
